name: Overview
data: [{"id":"31fd9245-43b9-4d43-a67b-a8d31fab710b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7d37b8d8-8654-48bf-b424-69f9ba47089a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overview","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"86035287-5728-4f88-a129-3a1ef9a2379f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is an abstract base class that defines the standard interface for all formatter implementations in the Jarvis system. It ensures that every formatter exposes a common entry point for generating formatted output, regardless of its internal logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bb8f1b88-407d-4fc9-a462-b803af089c23","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This class is not intended to be used directly. Instead, it provides a clear contract that all concrete formatter classes must follow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17b7cdab-6980-41f1-a297-07bce84af57a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2720e18b-686d-49f1-a0c5-5f2812d23459","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9fe4b410-6fef-484e-8996-b8991c688b83","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The main purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to enforce consistency across formatter implementations. By defining a required ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method, it guarantees that formatter consumers can interact with different formatters in a uniform way.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b78b0d4a-1663-413b-a04e-65972c1c259f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This approach simplifies integration, testing, and future extension of the formatting layer.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"681b546f-0e2f-4ed0-a71c-39aa6a8c6234","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"985c8609-54b5-47e1-884a-09a080b56d3f","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"23c873bf-e0e9-4299-a248-0537da79dff1","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"generate()","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"36b6f349-315c-49b1-ba28-53c98e89c7e1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method defines the interface for producing formatted output. In ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", this method raises a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NotImplementedError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to explicitly indicate that subclasses must provide their own implementation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"83dc0a24-dcad-41d6-8123-17e19561b506","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Any class inheriting from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is required to override this method and supply the actual formatting logic appropriate to its use case.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e819be93-6c29-4442-be19-00ad097bef25","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"95bdebf2-7c4f-4f14-98dd-bec0d32e8d18","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30321017-334e-413f-bfde-959ca3140bbe","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class CustomFormatter(BaseFormatter):\n    def generate(self):\n        return {\"status\": \"formatted data\"}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44f0a1f6-7e95-46e5-a78d-ae5ebbfc3926","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attempting to call ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" directly will result in an error, ensuring that only fully implemented formatter classes are used.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8ba77547-8080-41bb-9aeb-c250613494af","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1f51c3cc-03ad-49fb-b9b5-c67397de9c96","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Architecture","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3fb51f9-700a-4f9b-8b6d-4515cf2a7739","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Within the overall formatter architecture, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" acts as the contract layer. It decouples formatter usage from formatter implementation, allowing new formatter types to be introduced without changing how formatters are consumed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a40a227c-27bc-403e-af77-940e84e0c505","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"65ddb8f9-78eb-4dba-b446-0271f11bae75","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c653a044-4d5e-4e67-a4c9-5553b00f3758","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In summary, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class provides a minimal but essential foundation for all formatter types. By enforcing the implementation of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method, it ensures consistency, reliability, and extensibility across the Jarvis formatting ecosystem.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"16744197-efc9-4066-a567-da4b887fbeb9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
